replies.body: 11am-3pm for ARURF? hoping it's a mistake and instead until 3am.

Nope, it was definitely a mistake! Sorry for the confusing Hijack3d (and thanks for the defence RisingSwell) but we got this one wrong. 

To clarify it's live at the following times:

Friday 24/2 - 11am - 3am (the next morning) AEDT
Saturday 25/2 - 11am - 3am (the next morning) AEDT
Sunday 26/2 - 11am - 3am (the next morning) AEDT
Monday 27/2 - 11am - 3am (the next morning) AEDT

and 

Friday 3/3 - 11am - 3am (the next morning) AEDT
Saturday 4/3 - 11am - 3am (the next morning) AEDT
Sunday 5/3 - 11am - 3am (the next morning) AEDT
Monday 6/3 - 11am - 3am (the next morning) AEDT
11am on the 24th to 3pm on the 27th, theres no mistake, you just read it wrong :P
oh phew, haha thought it was 11am until 3pm each day! Cheers man.

I love Riot 
Blackfrost Anivia no longer has two bones jut out of her neck when using her Joke emote. You could say we got rid of her funnybones.
lmao i see you
Is ARURF on Howling Abyss?
No, it's still on SR.
omg how much damage teemo's's mushrooms can deal is pretty toxic am I right?

Excuse me, does anyone know if key fragments still drop in ARAM? I played over 10 games after the update but I haven't seen any of them drop, but my brother has earned some in less than 5 games and he hasn't updated his client yet

Can't wait till you guys (hopefully) make loading the client much faster after ending a game in low-spec mode. Would actually like to be able to talk to anyone in a game I've been in. Every time the client finally loads pretty much everyone has already left. 

Also, there seems to be some bug making it say I have 3 rerolls when I actually have 2, and indeed using one makes it go to 1 reroll.

played 2 games of arurf, won one lost one, didn't feel good about it either time because it was 100% win/lose based on which champs you got and not how well you can play.

And this is coming from someone who almost exclusively plays aram now, random and urf don't mix.
Why is it All Random URF, I always end up playing crap champions! Also some ADC buffs please, hands down weakest role atm.

is there anyone here ?
can give me a answer?

Issue with the new client, first win of the day timer doesn't refresh automatically so you have to refresh your profile to check it again and it doesn't show in minutes so you can't go 20 minutes left on timer, start a game now like you can with legacy client.
i see viktor still has his ulti bug many patches later.

I think a fun concept that I'd enjoy for an april fools event or something, could be the release on an old client. Like say, one from 2013, I think it would be a cool opportunity for players to experience the old times, and for newer players to experience some classics that went away. For example, I main poppy, but I have literally never played the old one before. :P Same with my friend that plays soraka. {{item:3185}}

Every patch I look for {{champion:82}} in the Bugfixes and every time I'm dissapointed. His abilites don't work, they've nerfed his core items and now with these mastery changes I fear he won't be able to compete at all. I understand the mastery changes will affect every champion but less damage means less shield and hes already in a bit of a poor state. rito plz fix ghost controls and +5 movespeed
